array.name: help
array.item: Make sure that GPS on your device is turned on.
Make sure you are connected to Wifi at LUMS Campus.
Select “Map” menu from the home page of the app. A map will be displayed.
Go to options menu on your device. Three options will be displayed: Current Location, Get Directions and Change Floor.
Gives your current location on campus.
Asks for source/starting location and destination location and displays the shortest route between the two on the map.
Displays the locations on the map according to the floor (for multi-story buildings).
“Emergency” tab on the main menu gives the numbers for LUMS Emergency Service (EMS) and the security office.

array.name: about
array.item: LUMS Campus Nav aims to provide all the campus details to the LUMS Community on fingertips. The app gives the map of LUMS and enables us to search locations and routes within LUMS. It also provides emergency numbers for EMS and LUMS security.
In order to protect your privacy and security, we ensure that:
1. We never store or collect data entered into any search fields.
2. We never store or collect logs of of your location.
